response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and contribute greatly to your success. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $12,000 to you at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your business further.", "product_price": 11000}
